purpose: Facilitates the creation and deployment of custom AI agents and tools directly from the terminal.
principle: Leverages Python and various AI/ML libraries to enable agent functionality, focusing on interactivity and tool integration.
reusability: Designed to be extensible with a modular architecture, allowing users to build and customize their own agents.
limitations: As an alpha release, it may have limited documentation and stability; primarily suited for experimentation.
name: agent-builder
description: An example agent demonstrating streaming, tool use, and interactivity from your terminal. This agent builder can help you to build your own agents and tools.
highlight: Interactive agent builder that demonstrates streaming, tool use, and terminal interactivity.
